description:
I colorized with a new technique, restored and created a sound design for this video of Hamburg, Germany  in the 1920s. You can clearly see what's going on in broad daylight, with the city's main activities and  population and transport and the management of the city's cleanliness.

Video Restoration Process:
✔ FPS boosted to 60 frames per second 
✔ Image resolution boosted up to HD 
✔ Improved video sharpness and brightness 
✔ Colorized only for the ambiance (not historically accurate)
✔added sound only for the ambiance
✔restoration:(stabilisation,denoise,cleand,deblur) 
✔Deinterlacing

Please, be aware that colorization colors are not real and fake, colorization was made only for the ambiance and do not represent real historical data.


B&W Video Source: K.S.-Film Kurt Schmidt (Berlin)

title: Hamburg, Germany 1920s in color [60fps,Remastered] w/sound design added
